duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all Employee Relations actions within the BCS execution units for projects located across the southern US, assigning and leading the resolution of workplace disputes and grievances on jobsites.
Review, deliver, and discuss investigation reports to legal and management for review, including trends and metrics reporting.
Provide counsel to the Project Workforce Services/Industrial Relations team, making recommendations on and coordinating disciplinary outcomes and correction actions.
Facilitate training programs for EDR/ER policies and programs and evaluate the effectiveness of implementation.
Support legal and HR teams in providing required documentation, claims, and legal matters pertaining to employee relations.
Oversee activities related to the Employee Dispute Resolution phone line for projects in the BCS companies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field, plus 7 years HR/IR experience (Master's preferred)
